Title: PJSIP: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in PJSIP, the worst of
    which could result in a Denial of Service condition.

Background.Text: PJSIP is a free and open source multimedia communication library written in C language implementing standard based protocols such as SIP, SDP, RTP, STUN, TURN, and ICE.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in PJSIP. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All PJSIP users should upgrade to the latest version:
